observation: Eck-Mundy Associates, Inc - Our Solutions Keep Your Business On Top!  Our Solutions Keep Your Business On Top! Need Help or Have Questions? 812-634-8001 Home Computer/Information Systems Workstations & Notebooks Servers Other Components Request Info Phone Systems Allworx Service Application Help Desk Computer/Electronics Repair Project Management Remote Monitoring Request  Service About Eck-Mundy Associates provides computer and telephone system sales and service to small/medium sized businesses and government agencies in Southwestern Indiana. We provide the budget-conscious solutions that are critical in today's competitive environment, with the service that keeps you productive. Eck-Mundy offers computing solutions to make your office more productive. From servers and workstations to notebooks, we've got the solutions to put your Eck-Mundy offers complete personal/business computers and server repair and service. We offer convenient on-site service as well as walk-in service with experienced Whether you're looking for a phone system with the latest in VoIP technology, or a digital system that utilizes your existing cabling, Eck-Mundy has a solution for all your Hours Our normal business hours are: Monday – Friday We also offer after hours emergency support.
